protein.specific_function: Has NAD-dependent 17-beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase activity. Converts oestradiol to oestrone. The physiological substrate is not known. Acts on oestradiol and 5-androstene-3- beta,17-beta-diol (in vitro)

reference.reference_text: Haeseleer F, Palczewski K: Short-chain dehydrogenases/reductases in retina. Methods Enzymol. 2000;316:372-83.
